faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: How to download TikTok videos without watermark in 2026?
faq.a1: It's very simple: 1. Open the TikTok app and find the video. 2. Tap 'Share' and select 'Copy Link'. 3. Paste the link in the box above and hit 'Download'. Your video will be saved without the logo.
faq.a2: Yes, SaveTikFast is 100% free and always will be. We do not ask for subscriptions, sign-ups, or any hidden fees to download your favorite content.
faq.q3: Does it work on iPhone (iOS) and Android?
faq.a3: Absolutely! Our tool is optimized for all devices. Whether you are using an iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone, or a PC/Mac, SaveTikFast works perfectly in your browser.
faq.q4: Can I download TikTok videos in 4K/HD quality?
faq.a4: Yes, our advanced algorithm automatically searches for the highest resolution available (HD, Full HD, or 4K) directly from the source server and provides it to you.
faq.q5: Can I save just the music/sound (TikTok to MP3)?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer a dedicated 'Download Audio (MP3)' feature. Just paste the video link, and you will see an option to extract and save the audio file in high quality.
faq.q6: Where are the videos stored on my device?
faq.a6: Files are usually saved in the default 'Downloads' folder of your browser. On mobile devices, you can also find them in your 'Files' app or Gallery, depending on your settings.
faq.q7: Does SaveTikFast store my downloaded videos?
faq.a7: Never. We respect your privacy. We do not host any videos on our servers, and we do not keep copies of your downloaded history. All downloads come directly from TikTok's CDN.
faq.q8: Why does the download link sometimes fail?
faq.a8: Please ensure the TikTok account you are trying to download from is 'Public', not 'Private'. Also, double-check that you have copied the correct video link.
faq.q9: Do I need to install an app or extension?
faq.a9: No installation is required. SaveTikFast is a web-based tool. You only need a web browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, etc.) and an internet connection.
faq.q10: Is it legal to use this downloader?
faq.a10: Yes, as long as you use the downloaded content for personal, non-commercial purposes (like offline viewing). Please respect the copyright of the content creators.

about.title: About Us
about.content:
Welcome to SaveTikFast, the leading TikTok Downloader for 2026.

We built SaveTikFast with one goal in mind: to provide the fastest, safest, and most reliable way to save TikTok videos without watermarks. Unlike other tools, we prioritize user experienceâ€”no annoying pop-ups, no registration, and no software installation required.

Our technology ensures you get the pristine quality of the original video (up to 4K) while stripping away the overlay logos. We are committed to keeping this service free and accessible to everyone worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us

We value your feedback and are here to help.

If you encounter any technical issues, have suggestions for improvement, or have business inquiries, please reach out to our support team:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
By using SaveTikFast, you agree to the following terms:

1. Personal Use Only:
Our service is intended for personal, non-commercial use. You may download videos for offline viewing and archiving purposes.

2. Intellectual Property:
We do not own the content downloaded via our tool. All rights belong to the original creators on TikTok. You agree not to use the content in any way that infringes on copyright laws.

3. Liability:
SaveTikFast is not responsible for how you use the downloaded material. The user bears full responsibility for any copyright infringement or misuse.

4. Changes:
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue services at any time.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Your privacy is critical to us.

Data Collection:
We do not collect personal information like names, emails, or phone numbers. We may use anonymous analytics (like cookies) to improve site performance and user experience.

No Video Storage:
SaveTikFast does not host or store any videos on its servers. All file processing is done instantly, and no history of your downloads is maintained.

Security:
Our website uses SSL encryption to ensure a secure connection while you browse and download.

dmca.title: DMCA Policy
dmca.content:
SaveTikFast respects the intellectual property rights of others.

We operate as a technical service provider and do not host copyrighted content. All videos are served directly from third-party servers (TikTok).

If you believe that your copyrighted work has been displayed on our service without authorization, please send a formal DMCA notice to:

Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

Please include the URL of the infringing content and proof of ownership. We will take immediate action to remove access to the content in question.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
1. Non-Affiliation:
SaveTikFast is an independent utility tool and is NOT affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with TikTok Inc., ByteDance Ltd., or any of their subsidiaries.

2. Trademarks:
The names 'TikTok' and its logos are registered trademarks of their respective owners. We use them solely for identification and descriptive purposes.

3. Content Responsibility:
We do not have control over the content hosted on TikTok servers and assume no liability for the videos downloaded by users.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.
